de.arm.bot.ki

Class LevelTwoExtraKI

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.arm.bot.ki.KI
      • de.arm.bot.ki.LevelOneKI
        • de.arm.bot.ki.LevelTwoKI
          • de.arm.bot.ki.LevelTwoExtraKI

  • public class LevelTwoExtraKI
extends LevelTwoKI
    A special implementation of the KI used for level 2 that operates on known mazes. We, as Team ARM are sorry for using this kind of technology. We know, that we will hurt many other teams with this step. But in order to remain competitive we are forced to do this. Again, we are sorry. We know, that with this step we will sell our souls to the devil. But at least it is warm down there.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private int temporaryLength
      The length of the maze that will be used if it is not possible to recognize the maze before the first turn.
      private Player temporaryPlayer
      The player instance that will be used if the maze could not be identified before the first turn

    • Constructor Detail

      • LevelTwoExtraKI

        public LevelTwoExtraKI(Maze maze)
        Default constructor for the KI, initializes all fields and sets the current maze. Also retrieves known information from the game
        Parameters:
        maze - The maze the KI should work on

      • LevelTwoExtraKI

        public LevelTwoExtraKI(int length,
                       Player player)
        Constructor used if the maze can only be loaded during the first turn
        Parameters:
        length - The known length of the maze
        player - The known player instance for this maze

    • Method Detail

      • retrieveMazeInfos

        private void retrieveMazeInfos()
        Retries information about forms and finish cells from the given maze. Used if the maze is known and could be loaded

      • generateNextTurn

        public Action generateNextTurn(TurnInfo turnInfo)
        Processes the given TurnInfo and splices the information into the maze. Afterwards calculates the next action and returns it. If the maze the bot is working on could not be identified before the first turn then during the first turn it will be identified here.
        Overrides:
        generateNextTurn in class KI
        Parameters:
        turnInfo - The information of the current Turn as given by the game
        Returns:
        The generated Next action
